name: Rectangular Bullion Confection Side Table
description: The Bullion Side Table inspired by stacked gold bars, is completely inlaid in cream shagreen, with a discreet bronze-patina brass mental indentation on the rectangular top. All the stacked gold bars are drawers. This is a fun statement piece for any space to make an impact. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti.All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans, the designer calls this finish "antique natural" shagreen.Currently made to order 8-10 weeksDesign SKU reference KST02R
